description: Request parameters for creating a new property list

base_properties.description: Array of property sources to evaluate. Each entry is a discriminated union: publisher_tags (publisher_domain + tags), publisher_ids (publisher_domain + property_ids), or identifiers (direct identifiers). If omitted, queries the agent's entire property database.

brand_manifest.description: Brand identity and requirements. When provided, the agent automatically applies appropriate rules based on brand characteristics (industry, target_audience, etc.).

filters.description: Dynamic filters to apply when resolving the list

title: Create Property List Request
